This dataset is available on the world values survey
[repository](https://www.worldvaluessurvey.org/WVSDocumentationWV7.jsp) as open
source.

```{r}
#| message: false
library(dplyr)

```

```{r}
#| message: false
# WVS_Cross-National_Inverted_Wave_7_csv_v5_0.csv
wvs <- readr::read_csv(here::here("data/wvs.csv"))

```

```{r}


# Ethiopia wvs 
eth_wvs <- wvs |> 
  filter(B_COUNTRY_ALPHA == "ETH") |> 
  select(B_COUNTRY_ALPHA, 
         # C_COW_ALPHA, 
         # Q_MODE, 
         N_REGION_ISO, 
         N_TOWN,
         G_TOWNSIZE,
         G_TOWNSIZE2, 
         H_SETTLEMENT, 
         H_URBRURAL,
         # I_PSU, 
         O1_LONGITUDE, 
         O2_LATITUDE,
         S_INTLANGUAGE, 
         Q177:Q195)

```

# Oromifa => 3390, 
# English => 1240
